GroupConferencing.title: Group Conferencing
GroupConferencing.message: MPC will let you host and join group video and chats with colleagues, friends and family through our secure, reliable, quality voice and video calling features.

Personalization.title: Personalization
Personalization.message: You’ll be able to make MPC your own with a host of personalization options.

Qualification.title: Qualification
Qualification.message: You’ll be able to track and visualize statistics for documents and emails sent within MPC.

Newsletters.title: Newsletters
Newsletters.message: You’ll be able to send newsletters, bulletins and vote requests to individuals or groups using powerful, intuitive MPC templates.

Invoices.title: Invoices
Invoices.message: You’ll be able to send invoices and payment requests to individuals or groups using powerful, intuitive MPC templates. You’ll even know exactly when they were opened and read.

VoiceVideoChat.title: Voice and Video Chat
VoiceVideoChat.message: MPC will keep you connected with reliable, quality native voice and video calling. You’ll be able to make secure voice or video calls to any other MPC contact from any conversation.

ClearAllChats.title: Clear all Chats
ClearAllChats.message: You’ll be able to wipe all MPC messages and chat history instantly on your device with one click of this button.
